item.title: Ahliah Bratzler
item.description: Ahliah Jo Bratzler (she/they) is a former public librarian gone rogue. As an employee at the Indianapolis Public Library, Ahliah created a staff committee to address the lack of queer support (for both employees and patrons) in the system.

item.title: Ariel DeWinter
item.description: Ariel DeWinter is a writer who likes to tell stories about people smooshing their faces together. Occasionally, they also write reviews for their best friend. You can find their work at arieldewinter.
